message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to try to get a better deal.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we split the difference and settle at $13,250?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $12,800?
